### ğŸ“¦ Installation

1. Download `ai-sidekick-v[VERSION].zip` below
2. Extract the ZIP file
3. Open Chrome/Arc â†’ `chrome://extensions`
4. Enable **Developer Mode** (top right)
5. Click **Load Unpacked** â†’ Select extracted folder
6. Click extension icon â†’ **Options** â†’ Add your API keys:
   - [Get Gemini Key](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)
   - [Get DeepSeek Key](https://platform.deepseek.com/api_keys)
